channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for RI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for RI

item.title: Report X-2024040077
item.description:
Report X-2024040077

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-05T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-25
  • City: WARWICK
  • State: RI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED FOR A WET PACKAGE ON THE SORT AISLE, RESPONDER FOLLOWED PROPER PROCEDURE THROUGH THE DECISION TREE AND RETURNED WITH PACKAGE TO DMP. UPON CLEAN UP AND INSPECTION RESPONDER DISCOVERED UNDERCLARED HYDROGEN PEROXIDE AND PEROXYACETIC ACID MIXTURES

item.title: Report X-2024040013
item.description:
Report X-2024040013

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-04T15:13:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-26
  • City: WARWICK
  • State: RI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO A SPILL. THE PACKAGE HAD A FLAMMABLE LIQUID DIAMOND HAZARD LABEL. SHIPPING PAPERS AND A UN NUMBER. THE PACKAGE HAD ORIENTATION ARROWS. THE PACKAGE WAS WET ON THE BOTTOM. RESPONDER REFERRED TO THE DECISION TREE AND BROUGHT THE PACKAGE BACK TO THE DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
